original: rjes su 'jug pa ni de la chos 'phra rab tsam yang zhugs pa med pa dang / byung ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'jug pa ni de la chos 'phra rab tsam yang zhugs pa med pa dang / byung ba med pa'o //
translated: following means that not even the slightest phenomenon enters or arises in it.

original: zhi ba'i blo gros /
analyzed: zhi ba'i blo gros /
translated: Śāntimati,

original: yi ge de dag ni 'ga' zhig nas lhags nas khong pa'i nang du 'jug pa med do //
analyzed: yi ge de dag ni 'ga' zhig nas lhags nas khong pa'i nang du 'jug pa med do //
translated: those syllables do not come from somewhere and enter the body.

original: yi ge de dag ni khong pa'i nang du gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yi ge de dag ni khong pa'i nang du gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: Those syllables do not abide within the body.

original: yi ge de dag ni byung nas phyogs 'ga' zhig tu 'gro ba ma yin no //
analyzed: yi ge de dag ni byung nas phyogs 'ga' zhig tu 'gro ba ma yin no //
translated: Those syllables do not arise and go somewhere.

original: yi ge de dag ni phan tshun 'bar bar byed pa ma yin no //🔽yi ge de dag ni smras kyang rung /
analyzed: yi ge de dag ni phan tshun 'bar bar byed pa ma yin no // yi ge de dag ni smras kyang rung /
translated: Those syllables do not mutually illuminate each other.🔽Those syllables are spoken

original: ma smras kyang rung ste /
analyzed: ma smras kyang rung ste /
translated: whether or not they are spoken.

original: zad par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: zad par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: It will be exhausted.🔽🔽

original: 'phel bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //🔽yi ge de dag ni chos she'am /
analyzed: 'phel bar 'gyur ba ma yin no // yi ge de dag ni chos she'am /
translated: They do not diminish or increase.

original: chos ma yin zhes bya bar rnam par mi rtog go /🔽yi ge de dag ni sus kyang bskyed pa'am /
analyzed: chos ma yin zhes bya bar rnam par mi rtog go / yi ge de dag ni sus kyang bskyed pa'am /
translated: Those letters do not think, ‘I am a Dharma teaching’ or ‘I am not a Dharma teaching.’

original: bkag pa med do //🔽yi ge de dag ni sus kyang byas pa'am /
analyzed: bkag pa med do // yi ge de dag ni sus kyang byas pa'am /
translated: Those letters are not produced or stopped by anyone.

original: chud gzan pa @301a *//🔽med do // zhi ba'i blo gros /
analyzed: chud gzan pa @301a *// med do // zhi ba'i blo gros /
translated: Those letters are not made or destroyed by anyone.

original: yi ge bgrang ba ji lta bar sems bgrang ba yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: yi ge bgrang ba ji lta bar sems bgrang ba yang de bzhin no //
translated: Śhāntimatī, just as the letters are counted, so too is the mind.

original: sems bgrang ba ji ltar chos thams cad bgrang ba yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: sems bgrang ba ji ltar chos thams cad bgrang ba yang de bzhin no //
translated: Just as the mind is counted, so too are all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad bgrang ba ji lta bar bgrang ba med pa yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: chos thams cad bgrang ba ji lta bar bgrang ba med pa yang de bzhin no //
translated: Just as all phenomena are counted, so too is the absence of counting.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: chos ni bgrang bar nye bar 'gro ba ma yin te /
analyzed: chos ni bgrang bar nye bar 'gro ba ma yin te /
translated: Phenomena do not approach counting.

original: bgrang ba med pa ni chos bgrang ba'o //
analyzed: bgrang ba med pa ni chos bgrang ba'o //
translated: The absence of counting is the counting of phenomena.

original: ji ltar chos bgrang ba nye bar mi 'gro ba bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar chos bgrang ba nye bar mi 'gro ba bzhin du /
translated: Just as phenomena do not approach counting,

original: aa zhes bya ba'i rjes su 'jug pa yang de lta bu ste /
analyzed: aa zhes bya ba'i rjes su 'jug pa yang de lta bu ste /
translated: so too is the engagement that follows the letter A.

original: bzod ma nyid nas ma skyes pa la 'jug pa /
analyzed: bzod ma nyid nas ma skyes pa la 'jug pa /
translated: The entrance into non-production is the entrance into non-birth.

original: skye ba med pa la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba med pa la 'jug pa'o //
translated: The entrance into non-birth is the entrance into non-arising.

original: ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba gang yin pa de la 'jug pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba gang yin pa de la 'jug pa gang yang med do //
translated: And what is non-produced and non-arisen has no entrance.

original: de ltar na 'jug pa med pa ni rjes su 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na 'jug pa med pa ni rjes su 'jug pa'o //
translated: Thus, the entrance into non-entrance is the entrance into the Dharma.

original: zhi ba'i blo gros /
analyzed: zhi ba'i blo gros /
translated: ŚĀNTAMATIR

original: su bgrang ba 'di la zhugs pa de'i spobs ba rgyun gcad par mi nus so //
analyzed: su bgrang ba 'di la zhugs pa de'i spobs ba rgyun gcad par mi nus so //
translated: The eloquence of one who has entered this enumeration cannot be stopped.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rgyun chad pa med pas des chos nyid rjes su rtogs so //
analyzed: rgyun chad pa med pas des chos nyid rjes su rtogs so //
translated: Because it is uninterrupted, it realizes reality.

original: des chos nyid mi zad par rjes su rtogs so //
analyzed: des chos nyid mi zad par rjes su rtogs so //
translated: It realizes reality as inexhaustible.

original: des ji lta ji ltar chos ston pa de lta de ltar chos de dag brjod cing mngon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des ji lta ji ltar chos ston pa de lta de ltar chos de dag brjod cing mngon du 'gyur ro //
translated: And as it teaches the Dharma, so those dharmas are expressed and manifest.

original: de chos kyi rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pa 'di lta bu 'dis sems can gyi rnam pa la 'jug par 'jug go /
analyzed: de chos kyi rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pa 'di lta bu 'dis sems can gyi rnam pa la 'jug par 'jug go /
translated: By this kind of entrance into the aspects of the Dharma, it enters into the aspects of sentient beings.

original: sems can rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pas mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston to //
analyzed: sems can rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pas mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston to //
translated: And by entering into the aspects of sentient beings, it teaches the Dharma according to their inclinations.

original: zhi ba'i blo gros /
analyzed: zhi ba'i blo gros /
translated: ŚĀNTAMATIR

original: gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' @301b ni sems kyis dri ma med pa yin no //🔽bsam pas rnam par dag pa yin no //
analyzed: gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' @301b ni sems kyis dri ma med pa yin no // bsam pas rnam par dag pa yin no //
translated: The bodhisattva who has attained retention is stainless in mind.🔽He is pure in intention.

original: sbyor bas gtsang ma yin no //
analyzed: sbyor bas gtsang ma yin no //
translated: He is clean in application.

original: lhag pa'i bsam pas mngon du 'phags pa yin no //
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pas mngon du 'phags pa yin no //
translated: He is exalted in superior intention.

original: bsgrub pa la legs par gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub pa la legs par gnas pa yin no //
translated: He is well-established in practice.

original: shes rab kyis mngon du 'phags pa yin no //
analyzed: shes rab kyis mngon du 'phags pa yin no //
translated: He is exalted in wisdom.

original: dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud pas brtan pa yin no //
analyzed: dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud pas brtan pa yin no //
translated: He is firm in fulfilling his promises.

original: bdud rnams kyis mi shigs pa yin no //
analyzed: bdud rnams kyis mi shigs pa yin no //
translated: He is unshakable by the māras.

original: pha rol mu stegs byed rnams kyi mi 'dus pa yin no //
analyzed: pha rol mu stegs byed rnams kyi mi 'dus pa yin no //
translated: He is unassailable by the adversaries, the tīrthikas.

original: nyon mongs pa rnams kyis mi rdzi ba yin no //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa rnams kyis mi rdzi ba yin no //
translated: He is unvanquished by the afflictions.

original: phyir rgol ba rnams kyis mi thub pa yin no //
analyzed: phyir rgol ba rnams kyis mi thub pa yin no //
translated: He is invincible to opponents.

original: lus kyi stobs dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: lus kyi stobs dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: He has physical strength.

original: sems kyis zhum pa med pa yin no //🔽spobs pa mi zad pa yin no //🔽bstan pa rnams la mtha' yas pa yin no //
analyzed: sems kyis zhum pa med pa yin no // spobs pa mi zad pa yin no // bstan pa rnams la mtha' yas pa yin no //
translated: He is not discouraged in mind.🔽He has inexhaustible eloquence.🔽He is limitless in the teachings.

original: nges pa'i tshig rnams la mu med pa yin no //
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig rnams la mu med pa yin no //
translated: He is endless in etymologies.

original: ye shes kyis chags pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: ye shes kyis chags pa med pa yin no //
translated: He is free of attachment through his wisdom.

original: blos gting dpag dka' ba yin no //
analyzed: blos gting dpag dka' ba yin no //
translated: He is difficult to fathom through his intellect.

original: bden pa bstan pa rnams la don zab pa yin no //
analyzed: bden pa bstan pa rnams la don zab pa yin no //
translated: He is profound in meaning through his teachings on the truth.

original: thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu yin no //
analyzed: thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu yin no //
translated: He is an ocean of learning.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi lhun po dang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi lhun po dang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: He is a mountain of samādhi.

original: 'khor gyi nang na seng ge dang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'khor gyi nang na seng ge dang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: He is a lion in the midst of the assembly.

original: 'jig rten gyi chos rnams la padma dang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chos rnams la padma dang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: He is like a lotus with regard to worldly dharmas.

original: sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bas sa dang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bas sa dang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: He is like the earth in that he is the sustenance of all sentient beings.

original: nyon mongs pa dang sred pa 'khru bas chu dang mtshungs pa yin no //🔽sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pas me dang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang sred pa 'khru bas chu dang mtshungs pa yin no // sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pas me dang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: He is like water in that he washes away the stains of the afflictions and craving.🔽He is like fire in that he ripens all sentient beings.

original: @302a *// sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas zla ba dang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: @302a *// sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas zla ba dang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: He is like the moon in that he is impartial toward all sentient beings.

original: nyon mongs pa'i mun pa sel bas nyi ma dang mtshungs pa yin no; ;nyon mongs pa'i mun pa'i dgra 'joms pas dpa' bo dang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i mun pa sel bas nyi ma dang mtshungs pa yin no; ;nyon mongs pa'i mun pa'i dgra 'joms pas dpa' bo dang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: He is like the sun, dispelling the darkness of afflictions. He is like a hero, conquering the enemy of the darkness of afflictions.

original: sems shin tu dul bas glang po dang mtshungs pa yin no //🔽chos sngon du sgrogs pas 'brug dang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: sems shin tu dul bas glang po dang mtshungs pa yin no // chos sngon du sgrogs pas 'brug dang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: He is like an elephant, with a well-tamed mind.🔽He is like thunder, proclaiming the Dharma first.

original: chos kyi char 'bebs pas char pa dang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi char 'bebs pas char pa dang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: He is like rain, showering the rain of Dharma.

original: sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad zhi bar byed pas sman pa dang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad zhi bar byed pas sman pa dang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: He is like a doctor, alleviating the afflictions of sentient beings.

original: chos kyi rgyal srid byed pas rgyal po dang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi rgyal srid byed pas rgyal po dang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: He is like a king, ruling the kingdom of Dharma.

original: 'jig rten gyi chos skyong bas 'jig rten skyong ba dang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chos skyong bas 'jig rten skyong ba dang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: He is like a world protector, protecting worldly beings.

original: lha dang mi rnams kyi spyan du gyur pas brgya byin dang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: lha dang mi rnams kyi spyan du gyur pas brgya byin dang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: He is like Śakra, being the eye of gods and humans.

original: dbang thob ste rang gi sems la dbang bsgyur bas tshangs pa dang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: dbang thob ste rang gi sems la dbang bsgyur bas tshangs pa dang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: Having obtained the consecration, he is like Brahma, for he has control over his own mind.

original: gnas med par rgyu bas bya dang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gnas med par rgyu bas bya dang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: He is like a bird, for he moves without a home.

original: 'du 'dzis 'jigs shing skrag pas ri dvags spre'u dang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'du 'dzis 'jigs shing skrag pas ri dvags spre'u dang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: He is like a deer or a monkey, for he is frightened and terrified of distractions.

original: sems can thams cad kyi nyes par byas pa thams cad bzod pas ma dang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi nyes par byas pa thams cad bzod pas ma dang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: He is like a mother, for he endures all the faults of all sentient beings.

original: bzo thams cad slob pas pha dang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: bzo thams cad slob pas pha dang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: He is like a father, for he trains in all the crafts.

original: chos rin po che thams cad sbyin pas rnam thos kyi bu dang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: chos rin po che thams cad sbyin pas rnam thos kyi bu dang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: He is like the son of a universal monarch, for he gives all the jewels of the Dharma.

original: bsod @302b nams dag gis brgyan pa yin no //🔽mtshan rnams kyis klubs pa yin no //
analyzed: bsod @302b nams dag gis brgyan pa yin no // mtshan rnams kyis klubs pa yin no //
translated: He is adorned with merits.🔽He is covered with the major marks.

original: dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis spras pa yin no //
analyzed: dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis spras pa yin no //
translated: He is ornamented with the minor marks.

original: 'jig rten gyis blta bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyis blta bar bya ba yin no //
translated: He is an object of the world’s regard.

original: lta ba'i gzhi yin no //
analyzed: lta ba'i gzhi yin no //
translated: He is a basis for views.

original: 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang ldan pas mi dbul ba yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang ldan pas mi dbul ba yin no //
translated: He is not poor, for he possesses the seven riches of the noble ones.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba yin no //
translated: They are accepted by the buddhas.

original: rig pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yin no; ;mkhas pa thams cad kyis skur ba mi gdab pa yin no //
analyzed: rig pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yin no; ;mkhas pa thams cad kyis skur ba mi gdab pa yin no //
translated: They are praised by the wise. They are not disparaged by the learned.

original: lha rnams kyis legs par gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: lha rnams kyis legs par gsungs pa yin no //
translated: They are well spoken by the gods.

original: klu dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis legs par bzung ba yin no; ;chos bstan pa rnams la dbang phyug tu gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: klu dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis legs par bzung ba yin no; ;chos bstan pa rnams la dbang phyug tu gyur pa yin no //
translated: They are well held by the nāgas and yakṣas. They are the lords of the teachings of the Dharma.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la dbang bsgyur ba yin no //🔽sems can gyi bsam pa rnams la rjes su song ba yin no //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la dbang bsgyur ba yin no // sems can gyi bsam pa rnams la rjes su song ba yin no //
translated: They are the masters of the superknowledges.🔽They are in accord with the thoughts of sentient beings.

original: sems can gyi dbang po rnams la rjes su zhugs pa yin no //
analyzed: sems can gyi dbang po rnams la rjes su zhugs pa yin no //
translated: They are in accord with the faculties of sentient beings.

original: chos bstan pa la chog mi shes pa yin no //
analyzed: chos bstan pa la chog mi shes pa yin no //
translated: They are insatiable in teaching the Dharma.

original: rnyed pa dang bkur sti don du mi gnyer ba yin no //
analyzed: rnyed pa dang bkur sti don du mi gnyer ba yin no //
translated: They are not concerned with gain and honor.

original: chos bstan pa dag la ser sna med pa yin no //
analyzed: chos bstan pa dag la ser sna med pa yin no //
translated: They are not stingy with the teachings of the Dharma.

original: tshul khrims rnam par dag pas nyon mongs pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: tshul khrims rnam par dag pas nyon mongs pa med pa yin no //
translated: They are free from afflictions due to the purity of their discipline.

original: bzod pa yongs su dag pas gnod pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: bzod pa yongs su dag pas gnod pa med pa yin no //
translated: He is without harm through the purity of patience.

original: brtson 'grus yongs su dag pas las kyi mtha' legs par mthar phyin pa yin no //
analyzed: brtson 'grus yongs su dag pas las kyi mtha' legs par mthar phyin pa yin no //
translated: He is one who has well completed his work through the purity of effort.

original: bsam gtan yongs su dag pas cang shes pa yin no //🔽shes rab yongs su dag pas @303a *//
analyzed: bsam gtan yongs su dag pas cang shes pa yin no // shes rab yongs su dag pas @303a *//
translated: He is one who is self-controlled through the purity of meditation.

original: blo legs par dkar ba yin no //🔽tshad med pa rnams la tshangs pa'i bla ma yin no //
analyzed: blo legs par dkar ba yin no // tshad med pa rnams la tshangs pa'i bla ma yin no //
translated: He is one who has a well-purified mind through the purity of wisdom.

original: bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la 'jig rten las 'das pa yin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la 'jig rten las 'das pa yin no //
translated: He is one who is beyond the world through the dhyānas, liberations, samādhis, and samāpattis.

original: byang chub kyi lam gyis bla na med pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi lam gyis bla na med pa yin no //
translated: He is unsurpassed through the path to enlightenment.

original: dbang bskur ba thob pas yon tan gyi rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba thob pas yon tan gyi rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: He is endowed with all the aspects of good qualities through the attainment of consecration.

original: zhi ba'i blo gros /
analyzed: zhi ba'i blo gros /
translated: Śāntamati,

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa ni yon tan gyi bsngags pa tshad med pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa ni yon tan gyi bsngags pa tshad med pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: thus the bodhisattva who has attained retention is endowed with such limitless praise of good qualities.

original: zhi ba'i blo gros /
analyzed: zhi ba'i blo gros /
translated: Śāntamati,

original: gal te de bzhin gshegs pas phrin las gzhan mi mdzad par lo brgya stong du rgyun du byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa'i bsngags pa brjod kyang zad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de bzhin gshegs pas phrin las gzhan mi mdzad par lo brgya stong du rgyun du byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa'i bsngags pa brjod kyang zad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if the Tathāgata were to praise continuously for hundreds of thousands of years the dhāraṇī of the bodhisattvas, he would not come to the end of their virtues.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis lha'i bu rgyal po bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis lha'i bu rgyal po bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the bodhisattva Śāntamati said to the devaputra king Sujāta,

original: grogs po / de bzhin gshegs pas khyod kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa mtha' yas pa brjod pa mdzad pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do //
analyzed: grogs po / de bzhin gshegs pas khyod kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa mtha' yas pa brjod pa mdzad pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do //
translated: “Friend, it is a good gain for you that the Tathāgata has praised your infinite virtues.”

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i bu rgyal po bzang gis byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i bu rgyal po bzang gis byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: When this was said, the devaputra king Sujāta said to the bodhisattva Śāntamati,

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Noble sir,

original: 'di la yang dag pa don dam par na gang de ltar bsngags pa'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'di la yang dag pa don dam par na gang de ltar bsngags pa'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so //
translated: in the ultimate truth, no phenomenon whatsoever is apprehended that could be praised in that way.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Noble sir,

original: gang la kha dog med pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / dbyibs @303b med pa de'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa dang / gzugs kyi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so //
analyzed: gang la kha dog med pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / dbyibs @303b med pa de'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa dang / gzugs kyi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so //
translated: That which has no color, no form, and no shape cannot be praised, and its limits cannot be realized.

original: gang la gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs 'ba' zhig yod pa de'i bsngags pa ni brjod par nus so //
analyzed: gang la gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs 'ba' zhig yod pa de'i bsngags pa ni brjod par nus so //
